description: The Purgatory Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Purgatory Resort for the snow report
Alexa, ask Purgatory Resort for latest conditions
imageAltText: Snow Report for Purgatory Resort icon
name: Snow Report for Purgatory Resort
shortDescription: The Purgatory Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Purgatory Resort.
